Posts.Content: Nov 27, 2018 12:04PM Mamihen wrote: You know, I read somewhere last year that people actually WANT to help in times of trouble. But they have to know first. I kept my diagnosis and surgery worries to myself for two months and only then told my sister and my mom. It was so nice to be able to share. Wishing you only the best! xoxo
Posts.Title: Who do I tell? Suzyshacklechick AliceBastable
